page.title: 01LOOKING AROUND CARLTON
page.content: The block we are surveying is on the boarders of{Yorkshire}and{ {Nottinghamshire.}The land in our area is{rural}not{urban.}The main features of our block are farmland and woodland. It is flat and moist. The land is very green with many trees. Our block is{agricultural}with lots of farms dotted about the place. There is only one hill.It is not natural,it is just a reclaimed mound which used to be a pit tip until it was grassed over.Mr Farnsworth,a local farmer planted trees on the mound to encourage wildlife.It is now used for grazing.He is hoping to grow crops on the mound. There are 3 villages Carlton in{Lindrick,Letwell}and Wallingwells. There is some industry in{Carlton}Parts of the land is wild and others cultivated.It is a pleasant place to live,very peaceful.
